text: John Richardson (19 January 1934 â€“ 5 January 2021) was an English actor. He was known for his roles in Black Sunday (1960) and in She (1965). He also starred in One Million Years B.C. (1966). Richardson died of COVID-19 on January 5, 2021 in London, at age 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London Category:Actors from Sussex
title: John Richardson (actor)
